channel.title: Problem with making myself admin on testscape o.O
channel.description: anyone help? Ive tried all i can think of.

item.title: Problem with making myself admin on testscape o.O
item.dc:creator: @ScimmyScape ScimmyScape
item.description:
@ScimmyScape wrote:

[quote=“Kitno, post:11, topic:103210”]If you’re wanting to see your crown make it 2, not 3 or 4.

Also, don’t have your server running when editing the character files. Save them then close them for it to work.[/quote]

^^ - He is right, you cannot be logged in to the charector which you are editing.

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with making myself admin on testscape o.O

item.title: Problem with making myself admin on testscape o.O
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

If you’re wanting to see your crown make it 2, not 3 or 4.

Also, don’t have your server running when editing the character files. Save them then close them for it to work.

item.title: Problem with making myself admin on testscape o.O
item.dc:creator: @ScimmyScape ScimmyScape
item.description:
@ScimmyScape wrote:

It should, Because i use TestScape and it works.
And also if you put yourself as player rights :3 then you wont see your crown.
Try using this
::pickup 0995 1000,
If 1k coins come up then your a Admin.

[quote=“ScimmyScape, post:2, topic:103210”]1 For Mod.

unless it’s only on certain sorces

item.source: Problem with making myself admin on testscape o.O

item.title: Problem with making myself admin on testscape o.O
item.dc:creator: @ScimmyScape ScimmyScape
item.description:
@ScimmyScape wrote:

Go to the charector file, go under your name, double click it a notepad should open, then go down to where it says rights.

CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 2735
character-posy = 3473
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = WINDOWS
character-lastlogin = 20060101
character-energy = 4
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 298

should look something like this ^^

Then change the rights too…

1 For Mod.
2 For Admin.
3 For Owner.
4 For Secret Admin ( Hidden Crown )

Hope i helped ~ Ashley.

Read full topic
